Generation V.Black: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves, using the cutters on its arms and sticky silk.
Generation V.White: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
Generation V.Black 2: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
Generation V.White 2: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.

Generation VI.X: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
Generation VI.Y: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This gentle Pokémon has strong protective instincts. The leaves on its arms are sharp enough to slice a thick tree in half with one stroke.
Generation IX.Violet: It fashions clothing from woven leaves. Though gentle in disposition, it will show no mercy to foes who target young Pokémon.

Generation V.White 2: Routes 6 and 12 , Lostlorn Forest ( Rustling grass ) Lostlorn Forest ( Hidden Grotto )
